mapper.select: select id, member_name, member_email, member_phone, member_last_login_date , created_date, updated_date from tbl_member where member_status = 'active' and member_role = 'buyer' order by id desc limit #{count} offset #{offset}
select count(*) from tbl_member where member_status = 'active' and member_role = 'buyer'

select rp.id, rp.payment_method, rp.payment_date, rp.payment_status, rp.request_id, rp.created_date, rp.updated_date, r.product_id, r.request_price, r.request_amount, p.product_name from tbl_request_payment rp join tbl_request r on r.id = rp.request_id join tbl_product p on p.id = r.product_id where rp.member_id = #{id} and rp.payment_status = 'success' order by id desc limit 3

select count(*) totalOrders, sum(r.request_price) totalPrice, max(rp.payment_date) lastPaymentDate from tbl_request_payment rp join tbl_request r on r.id = rp.request_id where rp.member_id = #{memberId} and rp.payment_status = 'success'

select m.id, m.member_email, m.member_password, m.member_name, m.member_birth, m.member_phone, m.member_provider, m.member_gender, m.member_role, m.member_status, m.member_last_login_date, m.created_date, m.updated_date from tbl_member m left join view_subscription_sub_payment v on m.id = v.m_id where m.member_status = 'active' and m.member_role = 'buyer' and (v.subscription_status is null or subscription_payment_status != 'success') order by m.id desc limit #{count} offset #{offset}

select count(*) from tbl_member m left join view_subscription_sub_payment v on m.id = v.m_id where m.member_status = 'active' and m.member_role = 'buyer' and (v.subscription_status is null or subscription_payment_status != 'success')

select m.id, m.member_email, m.member_password, m.member_name, m.member_birth, m.member_phone, m.member_provider, m.member_gender, m.member_role, m.member_status, m.member_last_login_date, m.created_date, m.updated_date, v.m_id, v.s_id, v.subscription_start_date, v.subscription_end_date, v.subscription_status, v.p_id from tbl_member m left join view_subscription_sub_payment v on m.id = v.m_id where m.member_status = 'active' and m.member_role = 'buyer' and subscription_payment_status = 'success' order by m.id desc limit #{count} offset #{offset}
